admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
This project will comprise: (i)
            processing and interpretation of some 5,000 kms of 3-D
            seismic data recently acquired in the project area; (ii)
            drilling and testing of five appraisal wells and
            installation of offshore facilities to enable long-term
            production testing; (iii) provision of equipment to
            strengthen the Bohai Oil Corporation's (BOC) data
            processing facilities, well testing and core analysis
            capabilities; (iv) carrying out special tests, laboratory
            work and a series of six studies to assist in the evaluation
            and future development of the discovery; and (v) training of
            BOC geologists and engineers in offshore operations among
            other special petroleum industry topics.
